u.a: <1w> holds out shape box object to Ruth .
<1w> shuts shape box and pushes toward Ruth
holds one ball and takes shape box object from Mother . one ball falls
<dur> picks up shape box object and puts in shape box <bef> attempts to put shape box object in shape box and succeeds .
opens shape box lid , rummages and takes out ball . holds ball up in one hand
<dur> picks up man and puts in car <bef> picks up car and rights it .
<aft> puts arm out to toys , searching <dur> other man falls out . <bef> picks up another man and puts in car .
<dur> man flies out of car . holds car <bef> picks up man and puts in car . puches car back and forth .

picks up two nesting cups and objects fall out . examines nesting cups . unnests nesting cups and holds one in each hand . kicks shape box object by accident . puts nesting cup on bean bag chair . attempts to retrieve nesting cups . picks up nesting cup on bean bag chair
<1w> taps on nesting cup stack . retrieves shape box object and puts on floor by Ruth's foot <1w> moves nesting cups stack by Ruth .
touches one nesting cup on top of nesting cup stack . touches nesting cup to floor . puts hand inside nesting cup
puts hand holding nesting cup up
holds nesting cup to head and ear . stands up
runs . stands , holding arms up in air . walks toward Mother
<1w> picks up man and holds up to Ruth
puts nesting cup in dollhouse and pushes dollhouse away
holds man over dollhouse and at the same time puts arm over toys ready to pick one up
picks up object . drops man in dollhouse . holds object with both hands and examines
drops chicken and then picks up . throws chicken in dollhouse
picks up another chicken and holds out to Mother
throws chicken in dollhouse and pushes dollhouse away
picks up car and puts down by Ruth
puts object down on floor by dollhouse
pulls dollhouse toward self , reaches in , and rummages . puts hand on chicken and puts down . attempts to pick up man and succeeds . puts man in chair
<aft> unnests cups , tossing them around violently . examines nesting cup
flails arms . holds out nesting cup
<aft> puts nesting cup over nose and mouth
moves a small step toward Mother
picks up ball and puts down . picks up object and puts down
<1w> pulls dollhouse toward self <4w-5w> puts hand on dollhouse .
<dur> attempts to get up <bef> attempts to sit on bean bag chair but falls over it .
<1w> picks up man . pulls dollhouse toward Ruth
<dur> manipulates nesting cup and man in hands <bef> examines nesting cup and man in hands .
<aft> picks up nesting cup . throws man and nesting cup in dollhouse
<aft> holds man on bed . lets man fall
picks up dog and holds out to Ruth
catches ball and holds on floor . flicks man toward Ruth
<aft> holds two men in hands . manipulates and examines them . puts men on fingers
retrieves men and examines them . sits on bean bag chair
picks up cup and puts in first nesting cup
picks up bed and puts in nesting cup
<1w> reaches in nesting cup and takes nesting cup out . takes out bed .
<1w-6w> holds out nesting cup to Ruth
<1w-5w> holds out nesting cup to Ruth
picks up nesting cup . brings toward nesting cup on floor . puts in Mother's nesting cup . picks up another nesting cup and attempts to put in Mother's stack . lets go of nesting cup
<aft> picks up man and brings to Mother
holds out nesting cup to Ruth
<1w> points to nesting cups on floor
puts man in nesting cup Mother is holding
<1w> puts nesting cup with man in on the floor
<aft> top nesting cup falls out . shakes nesting cup in hand
examines nesting cups . takes one out and tosses away . shakes the rest and holds . shakes again and touches inside . unnests nesting cups and holds
<bef> has hand on door knob . lets go . walks toward bean bag chair
<aft> leans to look at Ruth . taps dog on floor . holds dog
falls on bean bag chair , stomach down
<1w> turns toward toys and dances dog back .
rotates car . picks up dog and puts in car
